content.rendered:
Sunwing Airlines Inc. is a Canadian low-cost airline headquartered in the Etobicoke district of Toronto, Ontario, Canada. It was established on 2005. It  offers scheduled and charter services from Canada and the United States to destinations within the United States, Mexico, the Caribbean, Central America, and South America.

 

Sunwing Airlines in Ontario, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: 27 Fasken Drive
M9W 1K6, Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Sunwing Airlines Reservation and Information Center

Toll Number: 1-877-786-9464
Recorded flight departure/arrival information: 1-877-978-6946 for Sunwing Airlines

Administration

Phone: 514-871-1319 / 1-866-722-8066

Fax: 514-807-8563

Working hours: Mon – Fri: 9:00am – 5:00pm

Email: NA

Relay Services

Phone: 1 800 855-0511 (Voice to TTY) OR 711

Sunwing Airlines Official website: https://www.sunwing.ca/en/

Sunwing Airlines Online Check-in: www.sunwing.ca/en/sunwing-airlines/online-check-in

Note: Online check-in is available 3 hours to 60 minutes prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Sunwing Airlines flight status here: www.sunwing.ca/en/flight-status-alerts

Sunwing Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Sunwing Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Sunwing Airlines

Total fleet: 18

  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8

Special Assistance in Sunwing Airlines

Email: specialservices@sunwing.ca
Toll free: 1-877-877-1755 EXT 8091
Relay services: 1-800-855-0511 (Voice to TTY) or 711 (TTY to Voice) for people who are deaf, hard-of-hearing, speech-disabled or deaf-blind
Hours of operation: Monday to Friday, 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. EST

Traveling while Pregnant in Sunwing Airlines

  • Less than 36 weeks Pregnant Sunwing Airlines allow to travel
  • Upto 36 weeks Pregnant Women must submit medical certificate to Sunwing Airlines

For more details: https://www.sunwing.ca/en/sunwing-airlines/special-assistance

Queries handled by Sunwing Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Sunwing Airlines in Ontario, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Sunwing Airlines in Ontario, Canada: (click on the stars below)
